meanings.sent1: The axisymmetric flower petals were perfectly balanced around the stem.
meanings.sent2: The globe had an axisymmetric shape, with equal proportions on all sides.
meanings.sent3: The axisymmetric cake was so perfectly round that it looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her dance movements were as axisymmetric as a spinning top, graceful and harmonious.
meanings.sent5: The axisymmetric snowflake sparkled in the sunlight, its intricate patterns mesmerizing to behold.

meanings.definition: Relating to or exhibiting symmetry around an axis.
meanings.sent1: The axisymmetric design of the building made it visually appealing from all angles.
meanings.sent2: The satellite was designed with an axisymmetric antenna for optimal signal reception.
meanings.sent3: The axisymmetric pattern on his shirt made him look like a walking optical illusion.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was as axisymmetric as a well-balanced equation, with no extremes.
meanings.sent5: The axisymmetric mirror reflected her image perfectly, showing every detail with clarity.
